thread.title: Snap Digital Camera Takes Polaroid Back To Instamatic Days
thread.title_full: Snap Digital Camera Takes Polaroid Back To Instamatic Days

title: Snap Digital Camera Takes Polaroid Back To Instamatic Days
text:
Get Business & Technology Alerts 
4 Sep 2015 01:59 AM EST 
At the start of the millennium, it looked like the Polaroid brand was doomed. Now it’s making a comeback, and it has everything to do with nostalgia. The latest camera to bear the Polaroid name is the cheap-and-cheerful Snap. It’s built for fun and shareability, but in an old-school, Polaroidy way. Like other cameras with built-in printing capabilities, the Snap utilizes an inkless system that relies on ZINK’s special paper. The Snap will retail for just $99 dollars.
